title: Unsync'ed annex after addurls/drop?
body:
Continuing from #3901 we see a problem with annex info and annex content discrepancies.

The story is that essentially:

```
datalad create
datalad addurls
datalad drop
```

we end up with

```
❱ git -C MNINonLinear annex whereis 995174.164k_fs_LR.wb.spec
whereis 995174.164k_fs_LR.wb.spec (1 copy) 
        8f02413d-d3a0-4582-9ea7-10638ecb9565 -- [datalad]

  datalad: s3://hcp-openaccess/HCP_1200/995174/MNINonLinear/995174.164k_fs_LR.wb.spec?versionId=D4aseZea94UgHI0A1rH_ZWmrwwRnlmX_
ok

❱ git annex unused
unused . (checking for unused data...) ok

❱ git annex info
repository mode: indirect
trusted repositories: 0
semitrusted repositories: 4
        00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000001 -- web
        00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000002 -- bittorrent
        57ebaf54-f854-49a5-a3e3-9aab51d371df -- tkadelka@cpu4:/data/project/rehab_hcp/download_hcp/995174/995174/MNINonLinear [here]
        8f02413d-d3a0-4582-9ea7-10638ecb9565 -- [datalad]
untrusted repositories: 0
transfers in progress: none
available local disk space: 11.83 gigabytes (+1 megabyte reserved)
local annex keys: 0
local annex size: 0 bytes
annexed files in working tree: 8486
size of annexed files in working tree: 30.03 gigabytes
bloom filter size: 32 mebibytes (0% full)
backend usage: 
        MD5E: 8486
```

but also:

```
❱ du -shc */.git/annex/*
512     MNINonLinear/.git/annex/gitqueue.lck
1.5M    MNINonLinear/.git/annex/index
512     MNINonLinear/.git/annex/index.lck
3.8M    MNINonLinear/.git/annex/journal
512     MNINonLinear/.git/annex/journal.lck
9.0K    MNINonLinear/.git/annex/keys
512     MNINonLinear/.git/annex/keys.lck
27G     MNINonLinear/.git/annex/objects
49K     MNINonLinear/.git/annex/othertmp
512     MNINonLinear/.git/annex/othertmp.lck
512     MNINonLinear/.git/annex/precommit.lck
512     MNINonLinear/.git/annex/sentinal
512     MNINonLinear/.git/annex/sentinal.cache
49K     MNINonLinear/.git/annex/tmp
50K     MNINonLinear/.git/annex/transfer
```

I.e. a fully populated annex/objects, but annex claiming to not know anything about it.

Unclear how it came to be.
